articles.description: Six-time Olympic gold medallist Sir Chris Hoy tells BBC Breakfast about his life with terminal cancer and the legacy he hopes to leave.
articles.title: Sir Chris Hoy: British Olympic icon talks to BBC about terminal cancer

articles.description: England name an unchanged starting XV to face Australia in the Autumn Nations Series at Allianz Stadium on Saturday.
articles.title: England v Australia: Hosts name unchanged XV to face Wallabies at Allianz Stadium

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Sporting CP vs Manchester City in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Sporting CP vs Manchester City: UEFA Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Xabi Alonso says he will "focus on the game" and not the emotions of an Anfield return when Bayer Leverkusen face his old club Liverpool on Tuesday in the Champions League.
articles.title: Liverpool vs Bayer Leverkusen: 'No time for tourism' - Xabi Alonso on Anfield return

articles.description: BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following the Sao Paulo Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Versatppen, Hamilton, Russell, Pirelli wet-weather tyres

articles.description: Patrick Mahomes shakes off a late injury scare as the Kansas City Chiefs maintain their unbeaten start to the season.
articles.title: NFL: Patrick Mahomes helps Kansas City Chiefs maintain unbeaten start

articles.description: Defending champion Novak Djokovic pulls out of the ATP Finals because of injury, a move which sets the eight-man field for the event.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic pulls out of ATP Finals in Turin because of injury

articles.description: Celtic are looking for three successive home wins in the Champions League for the first time since 2007, but RB Leipzig are fighting for their lives in the competition, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Champions League: Can Celtic quell 'desperate' RB Leipzig?

articles.description: A pig's head is thrown on to the pitch during the Sao Paulo derby between Corinthians and Palmeiras in the Brazilian championship.
articles.title: Corinthians vs Palmeiras: Pig's head thrown on to pitch during Sao Paulo derby

articles.description: Former Real Madrid striker Karim Benzema says Kylian Mbappe must learn to play as a central striker because he will not displace Vinicius Junior on the left.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid striker must adapt to play with Vinicius Junior, says Karim Benzema
